thread.section_title: Barbeques Galore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Barbeques Galore | barbequesgalore.com.au
thread.title: Bharati

author: Bharati
title: Bharati
text:
Dave was very helpful and knowledgeable about the outdoor furniture I was interested, went out of his way to determine availability, colour and the quality of the product. It was great to see a sales person answering all your questions and demonstrate willingness to help respectfully and went out of his way to arrange delivery very promptly.
I will definitely return to this store for my future BBQ related purchases and recommend this to others.
Thank you for great experience.
